import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // Ensure this is imported function Cart({ cartItems, removeFromCart, placeOrder }) { const total = cartItems.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.price, 0); return (

Your Shopping Cart

{cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Your cart is empty

Start Shopping
) : (
{cartItems.map((item) => (

{item.title}

{item.author}

${item.price.toFixed(2)}
))}
Total: ${total.toFixed(2)}
)}
); } export default Cart;
